meanings.definition: Resembling a nib in shape or function.
meanings.sent1: The niblike tip of the pen made writing smooth and precise.
meanings.sent2: The artist used a niblike tool to create intricate details in the drawing.
meanings.sent3: The niblike edge of the cookie cutter gave the cookies a unique shape.
meanings.sent4: Her niblike fingers delicately held the brush as she painted.
meanings.sent5: The niblike design of the fountain pen made it stand out among the others.
